```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "airlines")


dbListTables(db)
dbListFields(db, "flights")
dbListFields(db, "weather")
```

```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT *
              FROM flights
              JOIN 
              LIMIT 0, 10;")

```
